author: Francisco-Gamino
body:
Fixed merging conflicts for https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/2605
Updated tests to skip on Linux and OSX as these cmdlets are not available there.
Split commits to separate product and test code.
Squashed commits to have one for product and one for test code changes.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @Francisco-Gamino Is #2605 supposed to be closed? If so, could you please update the title of this PR to reflect what is done in this PR?

title: Implement performance-counter cmdlets for Windows CoreCLR
